00032 #ifndef __DNA_MESH_TYPES_H__
00033 #define __DNA_MESH_TYPES_H__
00034 
00035 #include "DNA_defs.h"
00036 #include "DNA_listBase.h"
00037 #include "DNA_ID.h"
00038 #include "DNA_customdata_types.h"
00039 
00040 #include "DNA_defs.h" /* USE_BMESH_FORWARD_COMPAT */
00041 
00042 struct AnimData;
00043 struct DerivedMesh;
00044 struct Ipo;
00045 struct Key;
00046 struct MCol;
00047 struct MEdge;
00048 struct MFace;
00049 struct MLoop;
00050 struct MLoopCol;
00051 struct MLoopUV;
00052 struct MPoly;

00056 struct Material;
00057 struct Mesh;
00058 struct Multires;

00060 
00061 typedef struct Mesh {
00062     ID id;
00063     struct AnimData *adt;       /* animation data (must be immediately after id for utilities to use it) */
00064 
00065     struct BoundBox *bb;
00066     
00067     struct Ipo *ipo  DNA_DEPRECATED;  /* old animation system, deprecated for 2.5 */
00068     struct Key *key;
00069     struct Material **mat;
00070     struct MSelect *mselect;
00071 
00072 /* BMESH ONLY */
00073     /*new face structures*/
00074     struct MPoly *mpoly;
00075     struct MTexPoly *mtpoly;
00076     struct MLoop *mloop;
00077     struct MLoopUV *mloopuv;
00078     struct MLoopCol *mloopcol;
00079 /* END BMESH ONLY */
00080 
00081     /* mface stores the tessellation (triangulation) of the mesh,
00082      * real faces are now stored in nface.*/
00083     struct MFace *mface;    /* array of mesh object mode faces for tessellation */
00084     struct MTFace *mtface;  /* store tessellation face UV's and texture here */
00085     struct TFace *tface;    /* depecrated, use mtface */
00086     struct MVert *mvert;    /* array of verts */
00087     struct MEdge *medge;    /* array of edges */
00088     struct MDeformVert *dvert;  /* deformgroup vertices */
00089 
00090     /* array of colors for the tessellated faces, must be number of tessellated
00091      * faces * 4 in length */
00092     struct MCol *mcol;      
00093     struct MSticky *msticky;
00094     struct Mesh *texcomesh;
00095     
00096     struct BMEditMesh *edit_btmesh; /* not saved in file! */
00097 
00098     struct CustomData vdata, edata, fdata;
00099 
00100 /* BMESH ONLY */
00101     struct CustomData pdata, ldata;
00102 /* END BMESH ONLY */
00103 
00104     int totvert, totedge, totface, totselect;
00105 
00106 /* BMESH ONLY */
00107     int totpoly, totloop;
00108 /* END BMESH ONLY */
00109 
00110     /* the last selected vertex/edge/face are used for the active face however
00111      * this means the active face must always be selected, this is to keep track
00112      * of the last selected face and is similar to the old active face flag where
00113      * the face does not need to be selected, -1 is inactive */
00114     int act_face; 
00115 
00116     /* texture space, copied as one block in editobject.c */
00117     float loc[3];
00118     float size[3];
00119     float rot[3];
00120 
00121     short texflag, drawflag;
00122     short smoothresh, flag;
00123 
00124     short subdiv  DNA_DEPRECATED, subdivr  DNA_DEPRECATED;
00125     char subsurftype  DNA_DEPRECATED; /* only kept for backwards compat, not used anymore */
00126     char editflag;
00127 
00128     short totcol;
00129 
00130     struct Multires *mr DNA_DEPRECATED; /* deprecated multiresolution modeling data, only keep for loading old files */
00131 } Mesh;
00132 
00133 /* deprecated by MTFace, only here for file reading */
00134 typedef struct TFace {
00135     void *tpage;    /* the faces image for the active UVLayer */
00136     float uv[4][2];
00137     unsigned int col[4];
00138     char flag, transp;
00139     short mode, tile, unwrap;
00140 } TFace;

00142 /* **************** MESH ********************* */
00143 
00144 /* texflag */
00145 #define ME_AUTOSPACE    1
00146 
00147 /* me->editflag */
00148 #define ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X (1 << 0)
00149 #define ME_EDIT_MIRROR_Y (1 << 1) // unused so far
00150 #define ME_EDIT_MIRROR_Z (1 << 2) // unused so far
00151 
00152 #define ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK (1 << 3)
00153 #define ME_EDIT_MIRROR_TOPO (1 << 4)
00154 #define ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL (1 << 5)
00155 
00156 /* we cant have both flags enabled at once,
00157  * flags defined in DNA_scene_types.h */
00158 #define ME_EDIT_PAINT_SEL_MODE(_me)  (                                        \
00159     (_me->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK) ? SCE_SELECT_FACE :                  \
00160         (_me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) ? SCE_SELECT_VERTEX :              \
00161             0                                                                 \
00162     )
00163 
00164 /* me->flag */
00165 /* #define ME_ISDONE        1 */
00166 #define ME_DEPRECATED   2
00167 #define ME_TWOSIDED     4
00168 #define ME_UVEFFECT     8
00169 #define ME_VCOLEFFECT   16
00170 #define ME_AUTOSMOOTH   32
00171 #define ME_SMESH        64
00172 #define ME_SUBSURF      128
00173 #define ME_OPT_EDGES    256
00174 #define ME_DS_EXPAND    512
00175 
00176 /* me->drawflag, short */
00177 #define ME_DRAWEDGES    (1 << 0)
00178 #define ME_DRAWFACES    (1 << 1)
00179 #define ME_DRAWNORMALS  (1 << 2)
00180 #define ME_DRAW_VNORMALS (1 << 3)
00181 
00182 #define ME_ALLEDGES     (1 << 4)
00183 #define ME_HIDDENEDGES  (1 << 5)
00184 
00185 #define ME_DRAWCREASES  (1 << 6)
00186 #define ME_DRAWSEAMS    (1 << 7)
00187 #define ME_DRAWSHARP    (1 << 8)
00188 #define ME_DRAWBWEIGHTS (1 << 9)
00189 
00190 #define ME_DRAWEXTRA_EDGELEN  (1 << 10)
00191 #define ME_DRAWEXTRA_FACEAREA (1 << 11)
00192 #define ME_DRAWEXTRA_FACEANG  (1 << 12)
00193 
00194 /* debug only option */
00195 #define ME_DRAWEXTRA_INDICES (1 << 13)
00196 
00197 /* Subsurf Type */
00198 #define ME_CC_SUBSURF       0
00199 #define ME_SIMPLE_SUBSURF   1
00200 
00201 #define MESH_MAX_VERTS 2000000000L
00202 
00203 /* this is so we can save bmesh files that load in trunk, ignoring NGons
00204  * will eventually be removed */
00205 
00206 #define USE_BMESH_SAVE_AS_COMPAT
00207 #define USE_BMESH_SAVE_WITHOUT_MFACE

00211 
00212 /* enable this so meshes get tessfaces calculated by default */
00213 // #define USE_TESSFACE_DEFAULT
